dir-section.heading: The Press
dir-section.p: The publications listed below are in Lithuanian, except where otherwise indicated.

address.verbatim-address: Naujojo Sodo g. 1 a , K Centras, Klaipėda 92118

org-entry.frequency: 6 a week, with 3 supplements per week

org-entry.content-note: publ. by the Lithuanian Writers’ Union
religion, culture, history, politics, humanities and social affairs
media, music, visual arts, theatre, dance and cinema
publ. of fmr Lithuanian Union of Political Prisoners and Deportees (now part of Homeland Union-Lithuanian Christian Democrats—TS-LKD)
